testcase.name: If the cocktail does not exist in the cocktail DB, the API shall return drinks as null
testcase.system-out: When User search for cocktail input "Margariii".............................passed Then User should be able to search for cocktail status code "200"...........passed Then "drinks" searched should return null...................................passed

testcase.name: Searching for a cocktail by name is case-insensitive
testcase.system-out: Given User search for cocktail input "Margarita"............................passed Then User should be able to search for cocktail status code "200"...........passed Then User search for cocktail input "margarita".............................passed Then User should be able to search for cocktail status code "200"...........passed Then Two searches should be the same "Margarita" "margarita"................passed

testcase.name: API response must contain the certain Schema properties
testcase.system-out: Given User search for cocktail input "Margarita"............................passed Then User should be able to search for cocktail status code "200"...........passed Then "0" response should contain "strDrink" that is "String"................passed
